publicwhip.spmotion: S3M-4591 Sandra White: It’s Just Not Cricket—That the Parliament is concerned at the almost wall-to-wall coverage of the Ashes Test Series by the media; compares this to the limited coverage of other sports in Scotland such as curling and, in particular, Scotland international football matches, and considers this to be further evidence that Scotland needs its own broadcasting channel. Supported by: Rob Gibson, Gil Paterson, Bill Kidd Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
